summary: Project involves a deployed app (Version 18 in production) with partner profiles. User requested removal of the Government Notifications & Circulars section.

existing_features.title: Remove the Government Notifications & Circulars section from the website. This includes: (1) removing the <Notifications /> component from App.tsx, (2) removing the corresponding navigation link/entry from Navigation.tsx if one exists for this section, and (3) ensuring the page layout remains visually coherent after removal.
